DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study validate predictive model diabetic retinopathy progression patient diabetes mellitus type 2 patient clinically significant macular edema ( CSME ) need treatment either photocoagulation intravitreal injection ( ITV ) use non-invasive technique .
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Age 35 yearsold Nonproliferative diabetic retinopathy ( Levels 20 35 , accord ETDRS criterion ) Best Corrected Visual Acuity > 20/25 ETDRS chart Informed Consent Previous laser therapy Other retinal vascular disease Glaucoma Recent intraocular surgery ( last 6 month ) Inadequate ocular medium and/ pupil dilatation permit good quality fundus photography ( e.g . cataract ) HbA1C > 11 % Screening Subject condition situation may put him/her significant risk , may confound study result may interfere significantly his/ participation study .
